name: Amazing Maze
description:
A classic reimagined
Amazing Maze brings new elements and challenges to the classic "roll a ball" genre, in a colorful, relaxing and enjoyable experience, where you have to capture all the crystals and find the way out in beautiful 3D mazes. Use your creativity and logical thinking to overcome obstacles or use them to your advantage. Play with your friends locally or online (via Remote Play Together) in exciting matches for up to 4 players

Better with friends
Challenge your friends in local multiplayer mode or multiplayer online (via Remote Play Together) for up to 4 players

Great variety of levels
Various challenges and obstacles for you to overcome, in various levels with incremental difficulty

Creativity and logical thinking
There are several ways to overcome the same level. Use your creativity and logical thinking to print the best time on the global leaderboard
